front.title: Interface Stack Table Definition for Point to Point (P2P) Interface over LAN

abstract.t: The point-to-point circuit type is one of the mainly used circuit types in link state routing protocol. It is important to identify the correct circuit type when forming adjacencies, flooding link state database packets, and monitor the link state. This document defines point-to-point interface type and relevant stack tables to provide benefit for operation, maintenance and statistics.
